isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - SHORT SLEEPER LOWER SIDE TRIM PANEL

svcproc.title: SHORT SLEEPER LOWER SIDE TRIM PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Install Passenger Side Lower Side Trim Panel on Short Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 79
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Slide lower side trim panel (Item 3) behind B-pillar trim panel (Item 2).

Pull left side of back trim panel (Item 2, Figure 80)
out to allow rear of lower side trim panel (Item 3) to slide in behind back trim panel, passenger side shown.

Pull left side of back trim panel (Item 2, Figure 80)
out to access hidden push-in fasteners mounting holes. Install three push-in fasteners (Item 6) along the rear of lower side trim panel (Item 3), passenger side shown.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 80
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para:
Once the three push-in fasteners (Items 6, Figure 79)
have been installed along the rear of lower side trim panel (Items 3, Figure 79) . Install three push-in fasteners (Item 1) on left side of back trim panel (Item 2).

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 79
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Install two push-in fasteners (Item 5) just below sleeper window, passenger side shown.
Install three push-in fasteners (Item 4) across the top of lower side trim panel (Item 3), passenger side shown.
Install three push-in fasteners (Item 1), these fasteners go through the B-pillar trim panel (Item 2) and the lower side trim panel (Item 3), passenger side shown.

Install sleeper window assembly rubber trim (Item 5, Figure 83)
around window opening of lower side trim panel (Item 3, Figure 79) , passenger side shown..

If so equipped, install passenger side air line cabinets, refer to
SHORT SLEEPER AIR LINE CABINETS
.
Repeat procedure to install driver side lower side trim panel on short sleeper cab.
